title: Change how reviews are being handled in the Windows Store
body: Sorry if I sound bitter but I must say it's very frustrating developing for w10 mobile at the moment, even if the you get good reviews the chance of them being displayed in the store is very slim due to the version fragmentation. As I understand it insider reviews that aren't on the slow ring are removed, even worse they're deleted permanently from even the Developer Dashboard. People took time to write thoughtful reviews and they're simply deleted. I've started to continually download review reports to just have a record of them
